# Pull Request

## Summary
Provide a concise summary of the change.

## Changes
- What changed and why
- Any files added/removed

## Checklist
- [ ] Follows WordPress Coding Standards
- [ ] Passes PHPStan and PHPUnit (if applicable)
- [ ] Security: Input sanitized, output escaped
- [ ] PLACEHOLDERs highlighted and documented
- [ ] No duplications
- [ ] No errors

## Testing
Describe how you tested this change. Include steps and results.

## Screenshots
If UI changes, include screenshots.

## Related Issues
Link to any related issues.
